overview:
Jeff is the Founder of Want Me Get Me, a web-based startup entering private beta Spring of 2012.

Jeff’s background involves creative marketing strategies, design, and secured/high-risk, high-end printing and packaging technologies.

Hedge is passionate about startups, technology, customer service, strategies and execution, product, UX, design, location, real-time, and entrepreneurship.

Want to meet Jeff? Reach out via twitter or email anytime.
